Description: The following statement contains a magic number: using (var tcpReader = TcpReaderFactory.Create(Encoding))              {                  record.Text = tcpReader.Read(record.Server.Url' 43' record.Domain);              }

The following statement contains a magic number: if (record.Text.Contains("=xxx"))              {                  using (var tcpReader = TcpReaderFactory.Create(Encoding))                  {                      record.Text = tcpReader.Read(record.Server.Url' 43' "=" + record.Domain);                  }              }
